name: Indy Jumper
description:
Exciting adventure of Indy Jons, pixelated brother of the real one, through the aztec temple. Make your way through before deadly acid gets you. But be aware that many obstacles await you on the way to the top. Snakes are venomous, but elastic. Spikes are sharp, only sharp. Gold is precious currency for which you will be able to buy new fancy hat in the future.

One-tap easy-to-learn controls, climatic visual effects and addictive gameplay mechanics.
